Summary: object wobbling pretty much in one area over neighborhood sky
divs: Sighting DetailsI was coming home with my daughter and we were in the driveway getting out of the car and were heading towards our house when my daughter looked up at the sky and told me that the object above our skyline was weird acting and was not acting like a plane should be flying...I laughed and looked up and told her it looked like a plane to me...she said that it was wobbling around like a top or something and not flying straight like planes do...she has seen her brother off many times at the airport, plus, we live in Kokomo, and see lots of planes go towards Grissom Air Reserve base, so she should know....she got upset and bothersome at me and told me to come towards her and look at the object from where she was standing...so I moved more towards her way...I saw what appeared to be small engine type plane...like a 4 to 2 seater,....but sure enough, it did have some red and green lights on it ...but it did appear to be gyrating or the having the wobbling top toy effect and was not flying straight at all...it appeared to be circular looking once I moved around in the back yard to try to set a better view of it...then I noticed after awhile that it was not moving on out of the area like a regular plane would do...it kind of stayed in one area.(almost looking it was just moving back and forth in one spot)...it almost looked to me like it was even rotating and wobbling at the same time some once I stared at it for awhile.....I went inside the house and it was still around the area pretty much in the same spot where it started...weird I thought....decided to report it to your website...
trends: There have been 61 other sightings in Kokomo
There were no other sightings in Kokomo on or around April 9th 2008
